title: Alois Ruf Jr.
description:
RUF Auto has been building fast cars based on Porsche bodies for over 50 years. Alois Ruf Jr. is the genius behind one of the most famous Porsche-based cars ever, The RUF CTR "Yellowbird." His new car is a 710HP carbon-fiber bodied piece of art. 

https://ruf-automobile.de/en/

 

This car is available as a video: https://youtu.be/huhg1xNYAOw


Follow us!
T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @RUFsince1939
IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @RUFsince1939

https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
